properties.areaDesc: 5NM East of a line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage; Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued February 13 at 3:47PM EST until February 15 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, wind gusts greater than 22
knots and wave heights 4 feet and higher are possible. For the
Gale Watch, southwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt
and waves 7 to 10 feet possible.

* WHERE...Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI and 5NM East of a
line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 PM EST this
evening. For the Gale Watch, from late Friday night through
Saturday evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING
